XI.iii.1.B.5.a
.
General Eligibility for Plot or Interment Allowance
For a Veteran who was eligible for burial in a national cemetery under
38 U.S.C. 2402
, VBA may pay the plot or interment allowance.
Notes
:
T
he plot or interment allowance is not payable to an individual claimant if the Veteran is buried or interred in a State or national Veterans cemetery or other cemetery as listed in
38 CFR 3.1707(b
)Â or
38 U.S.C. 2303(b)(1)
.
Plot allowance is not authorized for Veterans with a date of death prior to June 18, 1973.
